pages.text: Skillets are an especially useful tool in a number of usecases. While the Cooking Pot is capable of keeping food inside of it for easy transporation, the Skillet is enchantable with fire aspect to increase it's potency.$(br)$(br)

pages.title: Trusty Equipment
pages.text: The Copper Pot and Cups are paired to be a quick, portable solution to culinary implementations, enabling one to quickly consume a variety of useful foods in tricky situations, and heat things more efficiently than standard cast iron.1$(br)$(br).

The Basket finds a great amount of use in easily storing items or liquids, behaving much like a hopper in some instances with it's ability to collect items, yet more easy to obtain and less engineeringly applicable.$(br)$(br).
